column4: daemonik, the mp3 algorithm is patented and the patent holder says mp3 encoding requires a license
Does decoding require a license too?
it can at any moment in the future if they say so. i think right now they don't require it.

I work for a small company that sells machines and we want to sell them with Ubuntu on them. We don't really have to worry about getting into any trouble selling the machines with the Gstreamer ugly packages installed by default do we? We want MP3 playing and things like that to work out of the box.
